name: The Blackstone Group

Blackstone
Blackstone is one of the worldâ€™s leading investment firms. We seek to create positive economic impact and long-term value for our investors, the companies we invest in, and the communities in which we work. We do this by using extraordinary people and flexible capital to help companies solve problems. Our asset management businesses, with approximately $440 billion in assets under management, include investment vehicles focused on private equity, real estate, public debt and equity, non-investment grade credit, real assets and secondary funds, all on a global basis. Further information is available at www.blackstone.com. Follow Blackstone on Twitter @Blackstone.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Competition, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Institutional affairs, Single market, Taxation
euInitiatives: General impact of EU legislation on investment activities across multiple industrial sectors in Europe
